title: Liz Truss – 2022 Victory Acceptance Speech as Prime Minister
author: admin
summary: The acceptance speech made by Liz Truss on 5 September 2022.

I will deliver on the energy crisis, dealing with people’s energy bills, but also dealing with the long-term issues we have on energy supply.
